com.tabish.berlinclock.support

Class BehaviouralTestEmbedder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbehave.core.ConfigurableEmbedder
      • com.tabish.berlinclock.support.BehaviouralTestEmbedder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jbehave.core.Embeddable

    public final class BehaviouralTestEmbedder
extends org.jbehave.core.ConfigurableEmbedder
    A class to fully encapsulates all of the JBehave plumbing behind a builder style API. The expected use for this would be: {code}aBehaviouralTestRunner().usingStepsFrom(this).withStory("your.story").run(){code}
